module.name: cable
module.keywords: module, cable, usage view, connector, terminal, connected terminals

abstract.p: the representation of the usage view of a cable with its connectors, terminals and the externally visible definition of the connection between the cable terminals.
abstract.li: definition of the usage view of a cable, including its connectors, terminals and terminal to terminal connections.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the usage view of a cable with its connectors, terminals and the externally visible definition of the connection between the cable terminals.

inscope.li: definition of the usage view of a cable, including its connectors, terminals and terminal to terminal connections;
items within the scope of application module Assembly module with packaged connector component, ISO/TS 10303-1645.

outscope.li: the design view of a cable.

aa.refpath: cable_terminal <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'connection area'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect {shape_aspect shape_aspect.description = 'connection zone'}

cable_terminal <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'mapped terminal'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect {shape_aspect.description = 'packaged connector component interface terminal'} shape_aspect => component_feature => physical_component_feature => physical_component_interface_terminal

cable_terminal <= shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition => physical_unit => cable_usage_view
